title: Damage
description: There was a time when I prayed for Rachel to be real―it ended the night she tried to kill me. When Dani was eight, she fell from a building. No one believed her claim that she was pushed by Rachel, her imaginary friend. It took years of therapy to convince Dani that Rachel was a product of her own mind.Now fifteen, Dani wants to make it as a dancer. But a deadly freak accident sends her a terrifying Rachel is back, she's real, and she'll stop at nothing to kill Dani. Complicating matters is Jesse, the school bad boy who's being stalked by his own invisible childhood monster.When Dani and Jesse join forces to learn why their tormenters are back, their investigation leads to a horrifying discovery―and the secret that binds them to each other.
author: Anya Parrish
